articles.author: Giorgio Leali
articles.title: French far-right MP suspended after yelling, ‘Go back to Africa’ - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Marine Le Pen slams the decision to suspend Grégoire de Fournas following racist remark in parliament.
articles.content: PARIS A French far-right lawmaker who shouted, “Go back to Africa!” in parliament as a Black colleague from the far left was talking about migrants will be suspended for 15 days following outrage ove… [+1048 chars]
